```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE)
set.seed(92)
```

```{r listLibraries}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r readData}
herrings <-read.csv("sledzie.csv", na.strings = "?")
```

```{r plotLength, echo=FALSE}
lengthPlot <- ggplot(herrings, aes(x=X, y=length)) + geom_smooth() + theme_light()
plot(lengthPlot)
```
